doc:
Prunella Scales https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prunella_Scales 0 Prunella Margaret Scales (née Illingworth; born 22 June 1932), is an English actress best known for her role as Basil Fawlty's wife Sybil in the BBC comedy Fawlty Towers and her BAFTA award-nominated role as Queen Elizabeth II in A Question of Attribution (Screen One, BBC 1991) by Alan Bennett. Prunella_Margaret_Scales ( née_Illingworth ; born_22_June_1932 ) , is an_English_actress best_known for her_role as Basil_Fawlty 's_wife_Sybil in the_BBC_comedy_Fawlty_Towers and her_BAFTA_award-nominated_role as Queen_Elizabeth_II in A_Question of Attribution ( Screen_One , BBC_1991 ) by Alan_Bennett .
